channel.title: Problem with the compilier help
channel.description: I did the mod tharoks perfect compilier thing right so then i click c to run compilier then it says succesful right, then i click r to run server and it says error you need to use a compilierwith your server. help, do i need to download a compilier or something? help [br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 03:58:49 PM[/size][hr]help please

item.title: Problem with the compilier help
item.dc:creator: @andy1234 andy1234
item.description:
@andy1234 wrote:

im not sure if this is da rite poll but srry i dont no much lol im new
ive loaded the compiler and i can runeserver.bat but when i try 2 log into my server it says server is down. so when i try it again it just says that my acount is alredy logged in. it does it all the time. but then when i try logging in on a new acount it loadz up with all the things on the side but the screen in da middle turns blk. after about a minute it den says error connecting to the server and loggs out. i try to logg back in but it then says that my acount is alredy logged in. can some1 plz help

plzzzz help me

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with the compilier help
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

don’t type ‘r’ to run server…just close the compiler and double-click on runserver.bat

i don’t know if the runserver thing on the perfect compiler is working…it might also be that your runserver.bat isn’t called runserver.bat if it isn’t you could change it to make it work with the compiler…but it has to be runserver.bat (case sensitive)

Read full topic
